title: Creamy Smoked Sausage Pasta

description: Indulge in this creamy smoked sausage pasta that combines savory flavors and a rich sauce, perfect for a quick weeknight dinner. Ready in just 30 minutes, this dish promises to satisfy your cravings and become a family favorite.
instructions: Cook the pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add the sliced smoked sausage and cook until browned, about 5-7 minutes.
Reduce the heat to low and stir in the heavy cream and Parmesan cheese. Mix until the cheese is melted and the sauce is creamy.
Add the cooked pasta to the skillet and toss to coat. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot, garnished with fresh parsley.
tips: For the best flavor, use high-quality smoked sausage and freshly grated Parmesan cheese. Adjust the creaminess by adding more or less cream based on your preference.
